title: Cáº¥u hÃ¬nh Buildspec
content:
Trong bÆ°á»›c nÃ y, báº¡n sáº½ táº¡o file buildspec.yml Ä‘á»ƒ:
CÃ i Ä‘áº·t tool táº¡o bÃ¡o cÃ¡o test Cháº¡y unit test cÃ³ ghi log káº¿t quáº£ Sinh HTML test report dá»… xem Chuáº©n bá»‹ sáºµn cho cÃ¡c bÆ°á»›c upload káº¿t quáº£ hoáº·c phÃ¢n tÃ­ch âœ… Má»¥c tiÃªu CÃ i Ä‘áº·t dotnet-reportgenerator-globaltool Cháº¡y test vÃ  xuáº¥t log theo Ä‘á»‹nh dáº¡ng .trx Sinh bÃ¡o cÃ¡o HTML dá»… Ä‘á»c ğŸ“ Cáº¥u trÃºc thÆ° má»¥c YourProject/ â”œâ”€â”€ Web.Tests/ â”œâ”€â”€ buildspec.yml â””â”€â”€ TestReport/ â””â”€â”€ index.html ğŸ§¾ Ná»™i dung file buildspec.yml version: 0.2 phases: install: runtime-versions: dotnet: 8.0 commands: - echo === Installing reportgenerator tool === - dotnet tool install -g dotnet-reportgenerator-globaltool - export PATH="$PATH:/root/.dotnet/tools" build: commands: - echo === Restoring dependencies === - dotnet restore - echo === Building solution === - dotnet build --no-restore - echo === Running unit tests === - dotnet test Web.Tests/Web.Tests.csproj --logger "trx;LogFileName=test_results.trx" - echo === Generating HTML test report === - reportgenerator "-reports:**/test_results.trx" "-targetdir:TestReport" -reporttypes:Html artifacts: files: - TestReport/**/* discard-paths: no ğŸ’¡ Giáº£i thÃ­ch Má»¥c MÃ´ táº£ dotnet tool install CÃ i Ä‘áº·t tool sinh bÃ¡o cÃ¡o test dÆ°á»›i dáº¡ng HTML dotnet test + –logger Ghi káº¿t quáº£ test ra file .trx (Test Result XML) reportgenerator Táº¡o bÃ¡o cÃ¡o HTML tá»« file .trx artifacts.files Chá»‰ Ä‘á»‹nh output cáº§n lÆ°u trá»¯ (bÃ¡o cÃ¡o test) ğŸ”„ CÃ¡c bÆ°á»›c thá»±c hiá»‡n Táº¡o file buildspec.yml trong thÆ° má»¥c gá»‘c cá»§a dá»± Ã¡n Copy ná»™i dung buildspec tá»« hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n Commit vÃ  push lÃªn repository Kiá»ƒm tra build trong CodeBuild ğŸ“Œ Ghi chÃº File .trx chá»©a thÃ´ng tin chi tiáº¿t vá» káº¿t quáº£ test BÃ¡o cÃ¡o HTML giÃºp dá»… dÃ ng xem vÃ  phÃ¢n tÃ­ch káº¿t quáº£ Artifacts Ä‘Æ°á»£c lÆ°u láº¡i Ä‘á»ƒ tham kháº£o sau nÃ y Cáº¥u hÃ¬nh nÃ y lÃ  ná»n táº£ng cho viá»‡c tÃ­ch há»£p vá»›i cÃ¡c cÃ´ng cá»¥ phÃ¢n tÃ­ch khÃ¡c

Dá»‹ch vá»¥ TÃ i nguyÃªn cáº§n xÃ³a CodeBuild Project ci-dotnet-unittest CloudWatch Rule codebuild-failure-rule SNS Topic test-failure-alerts S3 Bucket chá»©a artifacts ğŸ§  Máº¹o Sá»­ dá»¥ng AWS CLI Ä‘á»ƒ xÃ³a nhanh nhiá»u tÃ i nguyÃªn: # XÃ³a CodeBuild project aws codebuild delete-project --name ci-dotnet-unittest # XÃ³a CloudWatch rule aws events delete-rule --name codebuild-failure-rule # XÃ³a SNS topic aws sns delete-topic --topic-arn arn:aws:sns:region:account-id:test-failure-alerts # XÃ³a S3 bucket (pháº£i empty trÆ°á»›c) aws s3 rm s3://your-bucket-name --recursive aws s3 rb s3://your-bucket-name âš ï¸ LÆ°u Ã½ quan trá»ng Äáº£m báº£o xÃ³a Ä‘Ãºng tÃ i nguyÃªn cá»§a workshop Kiá»ƒm tra ká»¹ trÆ°á»›c khi xÃ³a Má»™t sá»‘ tÃ i nguyÃªn phá»¥ thuá»™c cáº§n xÃ³a theo thá»© tá»± Giá»¯ láº¡i source code trÃªn GitHub náº¿u muá»‘n tham kháº£o sau

title: Workshop Automated Testing Framework

Thiáº¿t láº­p pipeline CI/CD vá»›i AWS CodeBuild Viáº¿t vÃ  cháº¡y unit test tá»± Ä‘á»™ng Tá»‘i Æ°u hiá»‡u nÄƒng vá»›i parallel testing GiÃ¡m sÃ¡t vÃ  nháº­n cáº£nh bÃ¡o qua email QuÃ©t lá»—i báº£o máº­t tá»± Ä‘á»™ng vá»›i CodeQL ğŸ“š Ná»™i dung Workshop Giá»›i thiá»‡u - Tá»•ng quan vá» testing framework Chuáº©n bá»‹ mÃ´i trÆ°á»ng - Setup AWS vÃ  tools cáº§n thiáº¿t Unit Testing - Viáº¿t test vÃ  cáº¥u hÃ¬nh CodeBuild Parallel Execution - Cháº¡y test song song Monitoring & Alerts - Theo dÃµi vÃ  cáº£nh bÃ¡o Security Testing - QuÃ©t báº£o máº­t vá»›i CodeQL Clean Up - Dá»n dáº¹p tÃ i nguyÃªn ğŸ“ YÃªu cáº§u Kiáº¿n thá»©c cÆ¡ báº£n vá» C# vÃ  .NET TÃ i khoáº£n AWS (Free tier) TÃ i khoáº£n GitHub Visual Studio Code hoáº·c Visual Studio Workshop nÃ y Ä‘Æ°á»£c thiáº¿t káº¿ Ä‘á»ƒ hoÃ n thÃ nh trong 2-3 giá». Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ chia nhá» thÃ nh nhiá»u phiÃªn há»c.
